Class Tracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • Tracker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Tracker
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    The class Tracker represents an object which contains the Delivery Information of the application, as well as a thread to update the current date of the simulation.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Tracker()
      This constructor does not need to accept any parameters.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void adjustDate()
      Increments the current date int value of the Tracker.
      int getDate()
      Returns the current date int value of the Tracker.
      DeliveryInfos getDeliInfo()
      Returns the Delivery Information of the Tracker.
      int getSeqNum()
      Gets the current Sequence Number value of the Tracker.
      int getTime()
      Returns the number of minutes passed since beginning the Tracker's running thread.
      void run()
      Initiates the thread reliant commands of the class: Increments the current date, and updates the status of deliveries every 2 minutes.
      void setDate(java.time.LocalDate t)
      Sets the current date int value of the Tracker based on the given LocalDate parameter.
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> showAllDeliveries()
      Returns the list of all deliveries, in string format.
      java.lang.String showDate()
      Returns the current date in the Tracker in string format.
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> showDeliveryListPending()
      Returns the list of pending deliveries, in string format.
      java.lang.String showSpecificShipping(java.lang.String tracker)
      Returns the corresponding status of the Delivery with the matching Tracking Number.
      void terminate()
      Ends the tracker's running thread.
      void updateSeqNum()
      Updates the sequence number which will be added to the next Delivery's tracking information.

        public void terminate()
        Ends the tracker's running thread.

        public void run()

      • setDate

        public void setDate(java.time.LocalDate t)
        Sets the current date int value of the Tracker based on the given LocalDate parameter.
        Parameters:
        t - LocalDate object to be converted and set to the Tracker's date int value.

        public void adjustDate()
        Increments the current date int value of the Tracker.

        public java.lang.String showDate()
        Returns the current date in the Tracker in string format.
        Returns:
        String formatted version of dateToday attribute.

      • getDate

        public int getDate()
        Returns the current date int value of the Tracker.
        Returns:
        dateToday - Current date in the Tracker.

      • getTime

        public int getTime()
        Returns the number of minutes passed since beginning the Tracker's running thread.
        Returns:
        time Number of minutes passed since the beginning of the Tracker's running thread.

      • showSpecificShipping

        public java.lang.String showSpecificShipping(java.lang.String tracker)
        Returns the corresponding status of the Delivery with the matching Tracking Number. If the input parameter does not match any of the stored Tracking Numbers, then it will return the message "Does not Exist!" instead.
        Parameters:
        tracker - Input Tracking Number to be searched.
        Returns:
        Status of the delivery, in String format. If the input does not match any of the stored Deliveries' numbers, then it will return an error message instead.

      • getDeliInfo

        public DeliveryInfos getDeliInfo()
        Returns the Delivery Information of the Tracker.
        Returns:
        The Delivery Information Class attribute of the Tracker.

      • updateSeqNum

        public void updateSeqNum()
        Updates the sequence number which will be added to the next Delivery's tracking information.

      • getSeqNum

        public int getSeqNum()
        Gets the current Sequence Number value of the Tracker.
        Returns:
        The Sequence Number to be added to the next Delivery's tracking information.

      • showDeliveryListPending

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> showDeliveryListPending()
        Returns the list of pending deliveries, in string format.
        Returns:
        ArrayList of Deliveries which have not yet been delivered.

      • showAllDeliveries

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> showAllDeliveries()
        Returns the list of all deliveries, in string format.
        Returns:
        ArrayList of Deliveries.
